Interface ElementEventMethods<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>

All Superinterfaces:
IsElement<E>, TypedBuilder<E,B>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLContainerBuilder, HTMLElementBuilder, HTMLInputElementBuilder, HTMLSelectElementBuilder, HTMLTextAreaElementBuilder, Link, MathMLContainerMethods, MathMLElementBuilder, SVGContainerBuilder, SVGElementBuilder
public interface ElementEventMethods<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>> extends TypedBuilder<E,B>, IsElement<E>
Provides methods and default implementations for listening to element events.

  • Method Summary

    default <V extends Event>
    B
    on(EventType<V,?> type, EventCallbackFn<V> callback)
    Adds the given callback to the element.

    Methods inherited from interface org.jboss.elemento.IsElement

    element

    Methods inherited from interface org.jboss.elemento.TypedBuilder

    that

  • Method Details

    • on

      default <V extends Event> B on(EventType<V,?> type, EventCallbackFn<V> callback)
      Adds the given callback to the element. 

      HTMLLIElement listItem = li()
        .add(div().css("view")
                .add(input(checkbox)
                        .css("toggle")
                        .on(change, event -> ...))
                .add(label()
                        .text("Taste Elemento")
                        .on(dblclick, event -> ...))
                .add(button()
                        .css("destroy")
                        .on(click, event -> ...)))
        .add(input(text)
                .css("edit")
                .on(keydown, event -> ...)
                .on(blur, event -> ...))
        .element();

    • on

      default <V extends Event> B on(EventType<V,?> type, boolean useCapture, EventCallbackFn<V> callback)

    • on

      default <V extends Event> B on(EventType<V,?> type, AddEventListenerOptions options, EventCallbackFn<V> callback)
